titles.title: Major Medical Facility Authorization Act of 2021
A bill to authorize major medical facility projects of the Department of Veterans Affairs for fiscal year 2021.
Major Medical Facility Authorization Act of 2021
Major Medical Facility Authorization Act of 2021
Major Medical Facility Authorization Act of 2021
Major Medical Facility Authorization Act of 2021
Major Medical Facility Authorization Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Takano moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1910.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 413 - 7 (Roll no. 225).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
Major Medical Facility Authorization Act of 2021
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to carry out specified major medical facility projects during FY2021. The bill also indicates the maximum amount that can be spent on each project.
